name: openapi-doc
description: Programmatically builds an Open API (Swagger 2.0) document as an Express endpoint so that the documentation and source can live together in one place.  It is like annotating an Express endpoint.  Later, the API can be bound to Express.

scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run security
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:lint && npm run test && babel -d ./dist ./src
scripts.build:readme: node-readme && mv README.md README.hbs && jsdoc2md --template README.hbs src/index.js > README.md && rimraf README.hbs
scripts.release:publish: git add -A && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: rimraf coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec
